name: IngredientSub
0:
”Alexa, open Ingredient Sub.”
”Alexa, ask Ingredient Sub what can I substitute for chicken broth.”
”Alexa, ask Ingredient Sub what can I use instead of brown sugar.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ingredient sub
des: Ingredient Sub is a handy and simple tool to help with many common ingredient substitutions while cooking. Ran out of brown sugar? Ask Ingredient Sub what you can use instead and it will respond if there is a substitute, with specific quantities and various options. Includes over 100 common ingredient substitutions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
